titleStmt.title: Sad memorials of the royal martyr, or, A parallel betwixt the Jewes murder of Christ and the English murder of King Charls the First being a sermon preached on the solemnity of His Majestie's martyrdom in the Cathedral-Church of Sarum, An. Dom. 1669 / by T.L. ...
titleStmt.author: Lambert, Thomas, 1616-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Milbourn for Robert Clavel ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Lambert. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
